DefaultEvent.Description: "These people live in the mouth of a monster!" Arnold shouts to the Deductress. "Their protector one minute, destroyer the next - just like you and me! But I can end it! I've located the creature's brain. If I send a shock down the nerve-cord, I can kill it!" "You're not yourself, Arnold!" the Deductress cries. "It's your turn to play villain. You're doing it wrong!" Arnold replies with a scream. The tunnel walls are glowing with a crawling, crimson light. He switches direction and flees towards you; the tunnel seals behind him. The Maw flesh is healing, knitting itself together. You have to get out.

ChildBranches.Name: Try to catch Arnold
ChildBranches.Description: His mask has slipped from his head. He is revealed as a clammy, balding man.

DefaultEvent.Description: "He's not himself!" the Deductress cries. "It's his turn to play villain. He's doing it wrong!" "These people live in the mouth of a monster!" Arnold is shouting from deeper in the tunnel. "Their protector one minute, destroyer the next - just like you and me! But I can end it! I've located the creature's brain. If I send a shock down the nerve-cord, I can kill it!" He laughs, and then he is screaming instead. The tunnel walls are glowing with a crawling, crimson light. He switches direction and flees towards you; the tunnel seals behind him. The Maw flesh is healing, knitting itself together. You have to get out.

ChildBranches.Name: Try to talk sense into the Deductress
ChildBranches.Description: Her hair has escaped its bun; it whips wildly in the current. Her teeth are bared.

DefaultEvent.Description: "These people live in the mouth of a monster!" Arnold shouts to the Deductress. "Their protector one minute, destroyer the next - just like you and me! But I can end it! I've located the creature's brain. If I send a shock down the nerve-cord, I can kill it!" "You're not yourself, Arnold!" the Deductress cries. "It's your turn to play villain. You're doing it wrong!" Arnold replies with a scream. The tunnel walls are glowing with a crawling, crimson light. He switches direction and flees towards you; the tunnel seals behind him. The Maw flesh is healing, knitting itself together. You have to get out.

ChildBranches.Name: Follow, and observe
ChildBranches.Description: They're a fairly horrible pair. But it might be worth finding out what they're up to.

Description: The Deductress chases the Hempen Man - Arnold - deeper into the red, raw tunnel of the wound. The water is thickening with blood.
Name: A Blood Filled Tunnel
